ome.smuggler.core.convert

Interface SinkWriter<T,S>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CryptoSinkWriter, JsonOutputStreamWriter, JsonSinkWriter, JsonStreamWriter, MessageBodyWriter

    public interface SinkWriter<T,S>
    Writes a value V to a data sink S. For example, S could be an output stream and the value V could be serialised into the stream. Or V could be the body of a message to put on a queue S.
    See Also:
    SourceReader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void uncheckedWrite(S sink, T value)
      Calls the write(Object, Object) write} method converting any checked exception into an unchecked one that will bubble up without requiring a throws clause on this method.
      void write(S sink, T value)
      Writes a value to a data sink.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(S sink,
           T value)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes a value to a data sink.
        Parameters:
        sink - where to write the value to.
        value - the data to write.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null.
        java.lang.Exception - if the data could not be written to the sink.

      • uncheckedWrite

        default void uncheckedWrite(S sink,
                            T value)
        Calls the write(Object, Object) write} method converting any checked exception into an unchecked one that will bubble up without requiring a throws clause on this method.
        Parameters:
        sink - where to write the value to.
        value - the data to write.
